level.heading: TRANSFER OF DISTRICT AND FEDERAL SURPLUS PROPERTY (ยง 27-903)

level.text: The CPDO may transfer surplus District property between District agencies.

The CPDO may transfer federal surplus property to a District agency for use in carrying out or promoting, for residents of the District, a public purpose, including conservation, economic development, education, parks and recreation, public health, and public safety.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking incorporating 24 DCR 1705, 1709 (August 19, 1977); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 9345 (June 21, 2013).
